$	5.2.12
	%	Version 5.2.12
	*	<h1>Share using an auto generated QR Code</h1>
		<p>A new context menu allows to generate a QR Code to download a file in the cloud resources<b>
		Once generated, it can be used on brochures, playbills or other forms of public comunication,
		allowing people to quickly show the original file on any device, simply
		framing the QR Code using the camera app.</p>
		<img src="5.2.12_qrcode.png"/>
$	5.2.2
	%	Version 5.2.2
	*	<h1>Download folder</h1>
		<p>A new context menu allows to download an entire folder as a zip file</p>
		<img src="5.2.2_downloadfolder.png"/>
$	5.2.0
	%	Version 5.2.0
	*	<h1>Drag files</h1>
		<p>Files can be dragged into new mail message window, at drop time they
		will become new attachments.</p>
		<img src="5.2.0_dragtomail.png"/>
